meanings.sent1: She was breezing through her homework, finishing it in no time.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah was breezing across the savannah, chasing its prey effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was breezing up the tree, showing off its agility.
meanings.sent4: Time was breezing by, like a fast train on its tracks.
meanings.sent5: The wind was breezing through the open window, bringing a refreshing coolness.

meanings.sent1: He was breezing through the exam, answering all the questions confidently.
meanings.sent2: The experienced chef was breezing through the recipe, adding ingredients skillfully.
meanings.sent3: The magician was breezing through his tricks, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: She was breezing through the maze of challenges, reaching the goal effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The athlete was breezing through the hurdles, making it look effortless.

meanings.definition: To pass through quickly and effortlessly
meanings.sent1: The boat was breezing through the calm waters of the lake.
meanings.sent2: The clouds were breezing across the sky, creating beautiful patterns.
meanings.sent3: The idea was breezing through his mind, sparking creativity.
meanings.sent4: The news was breezing through the town, spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The melody was breezing through the room, filling it with joy.
